name: cardsmith-studio
description: CardSmith Studio: Windows-first desktop app for designing and exporting tabletop/card-game components.

scripts.dev: concurrently -n MAIN,UI -c auto "npm --prefix apps/main run dev" "npm --prefix apps/renderer run dev"
scripts.build: npm --prefix apps/renderer run build && npm --prefix apps/main run build
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm --prefix apps/main run dist
